title: Pakistan manufactures 12.27 mln mobile phones during Jan-July: Gill
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 27 (APP): Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on Political Communication Dr Shahbaz Gill on Friday said 12.27 million mobile phones were manufactured in the country during January to July 2021, exceeding imports for the first time.
“During the period from January to July 8.29 million mobile phones were imported,” he said in a tweet.
الحمداللہپاکستان نے اس سال پہلی بار درآمدات سے زیادہ موبائل فون تیار کیے ہیں
جنوری سے جولائی پاکستان میں تیار کئے گئے موبائل فون=12.27 ملین
جنوری سے جولائی بیرون ممالک سے امپورٹ کئے گئے موبائل فون=8.29 ملین
2018میں پاکستان مابائل فون کی درآمد کرنے والا ساتواں بڑا ملک تھا
— Dr. Shahbaz GiLL (@SHABAZGIL) August 27, 2021
He said Pakistan was the 7th largest importer of the cellulars phones during year 2018.
By the grace of Allah Almighty, Pakistan manufactured more mobile phones this year than importing from abroad.
